trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the persisted state of an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 封装 ActiveX 控件的持久状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.State> can be retrieved using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.OcxState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, or by reading the control's state from a data stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.State>可以使用检索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.OcxState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，或通过从数据流读取控件的状态。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the documentation for `IPersistStream` and `IPersistPropertyBag` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档`IPersistStream`和`IPersistPropertyBag`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: `IPersistStream` can be found in the interface reference section of the COM SDK documentation, and `IPersistPropertyBag` can be found in the COM Fundamentals interface reference section of the COM SDK documentation.
trans-unit.target: `IPersistStream` 可以在接口参考部分中的 COM SDK 文档中，找到和`IPersistPropertyBag`找不到在 COM 基础接口参考部分中的 COM SDK 文档。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.State" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.State" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.State" /> class for deserializing a state.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.State" /> 类的新实例以反序列化状态。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法不受信任的数据会带来安全风险。

trans-unit.source: Call this method only with trusted data.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法仅受信任的数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> in which the state is stored.
trans-unit.target: 在其中存储状态的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> indicating the storage type.
trans-unit.target: 指示存储类型的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> for manual updates; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于手动更新为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The license key of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的许可证密钥。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.State" /> class for serializing a state.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost.State" /> 类的新实例以序列化状态。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法不受信任的数据会带来安全风险。

trans-unit.source: Call this method only with trusted data.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法仅受信任的数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: 要填充数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: 此序列化的目标。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: 使用将目标对象序列化所需的数据填充 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `context` parameter, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`context`参数，请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>类。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: for executing unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于执行非托管的代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />
